symbols.summary: The macro version number of the LunarDate library (e.g. in version 2.4.0 this is 0).

symbols.name: DATE_MINOR_VERSION
symbols.summary: The minor version number of the LunarDate library (e.g. in version 2.4.0 this is 4).
